message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 400k, and I'll take the rest.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going all the way to 50/50. Take it or leave it!
You're not giving me enough credit for my negotiation skills. I'll give you 450k, but I'm taking the majority.
You're getting closer to the 50/50 mark, but I'm still not there. Meet me in the middle!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up on getting a slightly better deal. 530k for me, 470k for you.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a middle ground. This is my last offer before I start getting aggressive!
I'm not backing down. I'll give you 475k, but I'm taking the majority. It's time to meet me in the middle.
